name: Deep Space Defenders
description:
Deep Space Defenders | A Ludum Dare 49 Game

YOUR GOAL
ENEMIES MADE OF UNSTABLE MATTER ARE INVADING OUR GALAXY. THEY ARE EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND EXPLODE WHEN KILLED, BUT WE CAN USE THIS IN OUR FAVOR BY CHAINING THEIR EXPLOSIONS TO THIN THEIR NUMBERS. DON'T LET MORE THAN 250 ENEMIES REACH THIS AREA, OR CRITICAL MASS WILL BE REACHED.

GOOD LUCK, COMMANDER!

CONTROLS

Mouse Left Button Confirm / DeployMouse Right ButtonCancel / Move Around while draggingMouse WheelZoom In / Zoom Out

--

Developed by Lucas Felix and Jean Vilagrand. Special thanks to Black Mage who helped us with the spaceship designs and the Bonc Team for beta testing. Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.

To be implemented post-LD:

  • Windows Icon
  • Performance issues we're aware of.

Updates:

  • 10/05/21 - Changes in the Game Over screen so when the player is defeated it doesn't crash anymore.
  • 10/05/21 - First shot bug is now fixed. Minor performance issues fixed.
  • 10/04/21 - There was an issue with the original version in which the .exe crashed at the first shot. Debug version is used for now. Please ignore the console for the time being.
